summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris PDF printing functionality (STEP 4). All core features working correctly including Stampa Documenti button, MenuStampa modal, watermark selection, PDF generation for both Cliente and Operativo documents, modal close functionality, and Version API integration for CONTRATTO/DEFINITIVO stamps.
passed_tests: Stampa Documenti button visible and clickable on modifica-evento page
MenuStampa modal opens correctly when clicking Stampa Documenti button
Modal panel displays with proper header and close button
Visual feedback for selected watermark with proper color coding
Warning message displays for CONTRATTO/DEFINITIVO watermarks
Pacchetto Cliente section shows correct description and features list
Documenti Operativi section shows correct description and features list
PDF Cliente button triggers PDF generation with correct watermark in button text
PDF Operativo button triggers PDF generation (always BOZZA for internal use)
Modal can be closed with X button successfully
Modal can be reopened after closing
Version API integration working - POST request to /api/versioni when CONTRATTO/DEFINITIVO selected
Version API creates version record with correct event snapshot
PDF generation uses pdfmake client-side library correctly
Button states and text update correctly based on watermark selection
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Modal overlay prevents interaction with background elements
Responsive design works correctly on desktop viewport

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All PDF printing UI functionality working perfectly
